revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Reins of Unity |image = [[File:Reins_of_Unity_Highres.png]] |caption = ''Artwork of the Reins of Unity''. |use = Allows for the collection of Mane Hair [[Evolution Items]]. |obtain = Progress through "The Crown of Galar" [[Questlines|Questline]]. }} ===Description=== A Rein that can fuse certain Pokémon. ===Acquisition=== Progress through "The Crown of Galar" Questline. ===Effects=== Allows for the collection of the Mane Hair Evolution Items.
